# PDI Models Pipeline

Image processing ML pipeline for academic research.

## Essentials

- **Package manager:** `uv` (uv run, uv pip, uv venv)
- **Execution:** `.py` scripts only - no Jupyter notebooks
- **Language:** English for all outputs and documentation
- **Style:** No emojis. Hyphens instead of em dashes.

- [Planning and Workflow](.claude/docs/planning-workflow.md)
- [Code Quality](.claude/docs/code-quality.md)
